item.title: Wiki Layout for Reading
item.description: â€‹As many of you know, I’ve been working on a personal wiki for some time now. (See the CWiki repository.) In fact, I’m using it to write this post. It’s very comfortable for me. One of the things I have been trying to get absolutely right (for me at least) is the layout. There are really only two layouts; one is for the “reading” view, the other for the “editing” view.
